body.name: SEHMUA 4G LTE Cellular Solar Security Camera Wireless Outdoor, No WiFi Solar Powered Camera, 360° Live View, 2K Color Night Vision, PIR Motion Sensor, 2 Way Talk(32G SD&SIM Card Included)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 32 mins
features: 【No WiFi & No Electrical Power Needed】If you need a outdoor security camera, but you live or work in a place there's no Wi-Fi, even wire. Our 4G LTE solar security camera gonna be a wise choose! This cellular security wireless camera can work anywhere with 4G LTE coverage. Never mind about no Wi-Fi or no electrical power, such as barn, farm, ranches, construction sites, vacations homes, warehouse, RVs.

【32G SD & SIM Card Included】For your convenience, our package is equipped with a 32G storage card (support maximum 128G card) and an EIOTCLUB prepaid 4G LTE SIM card with 300M free data and 30 days’ free trial cloud storage. This SIM card has no contract, no activation or any extra fees. If the data is used up, you can directly purchase additional data in the APP. Meanwhile, supports AT&T and T-Mobile, Verizon can only be used by EIOTCLUB SIM card.

【Solar Powered & True Wireless】Our 4G lte security camera achieves the true wireless connectivity, totally cordless. With builtin 10400mAh rechargeable battery and 5W high-capacity solar panel, keeps providing the electric power to guarantee it works all the time as long as there is sunlight.

【2K Color Night Vision & 360° View】This trail camera cellular offers 2K high resolution with 4X digital zoom, wide angle lens with 355° horizontal rotation and 100° vertical rotation provides a wider and more flexible view angle. Even in dark, the full color night vision let you always keep eye on your assets.(Spotlight needs to be manually set on in the APP)

【PIR Detection & 2-Way Audio】With the sensitive PIR motion sensor, this cellular game camera can quickly and accurately detect any movement of people or animals, then immediately push an alarm notification to you through mobile phone. (You can set the sensitivity of this function in APP) At the same time, the two-way audio function equipped with the camera allows you to communicate through the camera anytime, anywhere.

The EIOT Club data SIM card comes with 300M trial data for users to use this 4G camera. After running out, you need to top up cellular data on UBox. Meanwhile, the camera can record footage to a micro SD card (included) or to the encrypted Cloud storage with a 30-day trial for new users.

Which operators does this 4G security camera support? The EIOTCLUB SIM card in the package can support T-mobile, AT&T and Verizon. You can also use your own mobile card，but Verizon can Only be used by EIOTCLUB SIM card. If the traffic is used up within the days you purchased, you need to recharge. Can this 4G LTE camera be used with wifi? It is Not available for WiFi, but only for 3g/4g LTE connections. What if my camera can't connect to the network? （1）Please check whether the SIM card is inserted correctly. （2）Please check the flow balance of your SIM card. After you recharge the quota, you need to restart the device （3）Please check your balance of the data. What capacity Micro SD card does the camera support? The 4G LTE cellular camera supports a Micro SD card of up to 128GB. Among them, the package contains a 32GB SD card. Why can't my camera work after replacing my own SIM card？ If you need to replace your own SIM card, you need to restore the factory settings to run normally, just press the reset key to restart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works like a charm
reviews.reviewText: This is a great camera when you don’t have WiFi available. Super easy to set up, great price and everything you need comes in the box. You just charge the camera, set it up and mount. There is a service fee but it’s very reasonable. The app is also very easy to use. The camera has good night vision and motion sensor notifications.I’m on day 3 and the battery is still full and I’ve been getting quite a few notifications due to neighborhood cats. I also have the solar panel plugged up so the battery is either that good or they work great together. This would be great for camping ect.. I would definitely recommend. Hopefully I won’t eat my words. 😬

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and works great!
reviews.reviewText: This is the 2nd one of these cameras I have purchased. I use them to monitor my property that doesn't have wifi or electricity and they work perfectly for that! The app is easy to use and getting them up and running is quick and painless. Motion detection works very good but not overly sensitive to small disturbances like leaves/bugs /rain(the smallest thing I've had set it off was a house cat). I like using the cloud bc you can see what triggered the camera to record. Otherwise you would have to pull the SD card every time to see the recorded videos. It's a small fee after the 30 day free trail but well worth it in my opinion. The microphone and audio work pretty good you can clearly hear what I'm saying on it from 30ft away or more. So if you need to talk to someone thru it( like a delivery driver) it's very easy to do. Picture quality is good especially on HD. The night vision is also very clear even on IR mode which is what I use bc I don't want the bright white light coming on giving away the cameras location. All these features are changed thru the app no need to physically be at the camera. The solar charging works good my one camera only gets about 3 hrs of direct sunlight a day and it has never gotten low. It charges even when light is dim or it's raining. These cameras have given me peace of mind that my property is safe and alert me when someone is there. Very glad I bought them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall a pretty good camera especially for the price point
reviews.reviewText: This is a honest review of the product. My first camera was defective as it would not charge with the provided solar panel. It took me a while to figure this out as the battery power consuption was very good so I couldn't easily tell whether it was not charging or perhaps it wasn't receiving enough sun light. The replacement camera came quickly, next day or two after reporting. The image quality was descent but felt a ted bit inferior in comparison to the defective unit i returned. There are a dozen or more competitor cameras whose feature set and software, all the way the way to the setup are the same. In fact, my prior competitor brand was Siliom which was priced much higher and didn't come with a memory card. I thought I would gives these guys a shot as they were priced at least 25% cheaper and came with a memory card. The pan and tilt on this camera was much more responsive than the siliom camera. However, the down fall on both these cameras are the motion detection. It seems to be detecting beyond it's range and even on the lowest settings I am picking up a lot of false alarms. Grass and tree movements are being picked up. I wish we could define the motion detection zones, I believe this would seriously reduce the false detection. I don't think those antennas are any good because my cell would pick up an extra bar than the cameras. I initially used a tmobile card and the signal was very poor in my area that caused my battery to drain fast when it has trouble connecting. Switching over the triple band card provided was better and didn't drain as much. So the down side of the elliot triple band card provided is that it is tied to a higher monthly fee and you get more data for the higher fee. The problem it is a lot more data than i need but you won't be able to get a cheaper plan even though there exists cheaper plans from Elliot club. You would have to buy a different card from Elliot here on amazon where you would be able to get plans for almost half the price. You can also get data plans for tmobile for $5.99 a month for 500MB of high speed after which they will trottle you. The only down side with the tmobile plan is that you are the $35 activation fee for the line. I have the camera for a short time now, so far it has served it's purpose, just wished the motion detection was more usable. Other than that, it is a great camera for the price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality, Ease, Reliability
reviews.reviewText: LOVE THIS! Buyer beware you have to subscribe to a cellular service. We were aware and this product is fabulous. Clear images and live visibility. We use this for security at a job site. VERY EFFECTIVE in all weather. Captures movement with ease. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We purchased two of these cameras for our ranch property to ‘have eyes’ when we aren’t there. The product is great- highly reliable, and never fails, standing strong during inclement and is high quality. The camera itself has a great picture for both day and night with high visibility. And above all a reasonable price- you get more bang for your buck for sure! We loved it so much we referred my father to use on his land/ranch also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These cameras are so great!!! I have purchased a total of 5 over the past year and have had excellent results. Great cell service and operation is easy and great videos and photos. I recently had one camera developed a foggy lens and I contacted customer support and they was great helping me with the problem. I will be purchasing more of these cameras and in courage everyone looking for a great cellular camera to purchase these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product and Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: We purchased 2 cameras for our vacation property. Easy to set up. Solar charged. Even in a blizzard we are able to see our building. We are able to talk with people at the build site through our app. The app sends us notifications when activity is detected. We had a slight issue with the camera panning and after reaching out to customer service through their app, they promptly remedied our issue. Great product. Great customer service.
